drawing_procedure: NONE

On ninth row (vertical row) from left, on fifth and sixth tiles from top, leave them blank, also leave the tile to the left (centered most) and to the right, (exactly opposite the left most blank one). This forms a cluster of 4 blank tiles, color all tiles touching this cluster yellow, Now color an additional tile yellow to the right of the rightmost pair, and the leftmost pair. This will form a sort of yellow diamond shape.
NONE
In columns, #6 and #12 paint the fifth tile down yellow.
In columns, #7 and #11 paint the fifth and sixth tiles down yellow.
In columns, #8 and #10 paint the fourth and sixth tiles down yellow.
Finally, in column #9 paint the fourth and seventh tiles down yellow.
NONE
With yellow, paint the cell at the 9th column from the left and 4th row from he top.
With yellow, paint the cell at the 9th column from the left and 7th row from he top.
With yellow, paint the cell at the 6th column from the left and 5th row from he top.
With yellow, paint the cell at the 12th column from the left and 5th row from he top.
With the yellow cells as the vertices, connect the 4 yellow cells to make a 4-sided hollow shape.
NONE
In columns # 3, 5, 15 and 17 paint the second and third tiles from the top yellow, then paint the tiles second and third from the bottom yellow.
In columns # 4 and 16 paint the first and third tiles from the top yellow, then paint the tiles second and fourth from the bottom yellow.
In columns # 6, 8, 12 and 14 paint the third and fourth tiles from the top red, then paint the tiles fourth and fifth from the bottom red.
In columns # 7, and 13 paint the third, fifth, sixth and eighth tiles from the top red.
In columns # 9, and 11 paint the fifth and sixth tiles from the top green.
In columns # 10, paint the fourth and sixth tiles from the top green.
NONE

Make an "X" of flowers with a green flower in the center, four red flowers extending out from the right and left of the green flower, and yellow flowers at the end of each of the arms. Each flower should be made out of six colored tiles and should be connected to adjacent tiles on outside edges of the tiles. The green flower is centered around the fifth tile of the tenth column.
NONE
Use green to create a circle around the 5th spot in the 10th column.
Use red to make circles around the 4th and 7th spots on the 7th and 13th columns.
Use yellow to make circles around the 2nd and 8th spots in the 4th and 16th columns.
NONE
Skip the top cell in the upper-left most corner and paint the one below it blue.
Color all cells touching the right of the cell(s) in the previous step blue.
Repeat step 2.
Skip the cells directly to the right of the ones in step 3 and repeat steps 1-3 starting with the cell in line with the middle cell of step 3.
Repeat step 4 two more times to create a line of blue pyramids.
Repeat steps 1-5 by skipping 2 cells down from the initial cell in step one and coloring them all purple.
Repeat step 6 but with yellow and starting from the first cell in step 6.
NONE
This will be 3 sets of 4 triangles pointing left when finished.
Starting on the left, the 2nd tile down is blue.
The 2nd column from the left, the top two tiles are blue.
The 3rd column from the left the top 3 tiles are blue.
Skip one column, then repeat the pattern 3 times. (You should be starting in column 5 for the 2nd triangle.) When finished, you will have 4 blue triangles.
There are 2 more rows of 4 triangles exactly the same below these but the colors are different. From top to bottom the color will be blue, purple, yellow.
Your first purple triangle should start in the first column from the left, the 5th tile from the top.
Your first yellow triangle should start in the first column from the left, the 3rd tile from the bottom.
You are finished when you have 3 sets of 4 triangles.
NONE
In the first column, color the 2nd tile blue, the 5th tile purple and the 8th tile yellow.
Repeat step in columns 5, 9 and 13.
In column 2 color tiles 1 and 2 blue, tiles 4 and 5 purple and tiles 7 and 8 yellow.
Repeat step 3 for columns 6, 10 and 14.
In column 3 color tiles 1, 2 and 3 blue, tiles 4, 5 and 6 purple and tiles 7, 8 and 9 yellow.
Repeat step 5 for columns 7, 11 and 15.

NONE
Paint the first five hexagons in column 10 green and the rest blue.
Paint the third hexagon in the sixth column green and the eighth hexagon in the same column blue and paint the hexagons in between them in the same column red.
Starting with the sixth hexagon in column one, paint an orange line of hexagons diagonally up to the single green hexagon in column six and paint the hexagons orange forming a diagonal line to the blue hexagon in column six as well.
Paint the hexagons between the two orange diagonal lines orange all the way over to the line of red hexagons, to make an orange triangle of hexagons.
Paint a diagonal line of green hexagons from the third hexagon in column six to meet with the last green hexagon in column ten and a row of blue from the blue hexagon in the third column to the last hexagon in the tenth column.
Starting with the row of red hexagons and moving to the right, paint a red triangle by painting hexagons five, six, and seven in column seven red, five and six in column eight red, and hexagon six in column nine red.
Paint the rest of the hexagons to the left of the blue hexagons in column ten to make a blue triangle and paint the hexagons to the left of the green hexagons in the same column to make a green triangle, both the same size as the orange triangle.
NONE
In the 7th column from the left, color the 5th tile from the bottom RED.

In the 6th column from the left, color the 4th and 7th tiles from the top RED. Color the 6th tile from the top of the 9th column from the left RED as well. Connect these three points with RED lines to make a red equilateral triangle.
Color the five tiles bordering the upper right side of the red triangle GREEN.
Color the five tiles bordering the lower right side of the red triangle BLUE.
Color the five tiles bordering the left side of the red triangle ORANGE.
Color the 5th tile from the bottom in the leftmost column ORANGE.
In the 10th column from the left, color the topmost tile GREEN and the bottom-most tile BLUE.

For each of the colors BLUE, GREEN, ORANGE, you should now have a row of tiles bordering the red triangle and an exterior point. Connect the edges of the rows to the points and fill in all enclosing tiles with the respective color.
You should see three solid equilateral triangles (BLUE, GREEN, ORANGE) surrounding a smaller RED equilateral triangle.
NONE
In column #1 paint the sixth tile down orange.
In column #2 paint the fifth and sixth tile down orange.
In column #3 paint the fifth, sixth and seventh tile down orange.
In column #4 starting at the fourth tile from the top, paint 4 tiles down orange.
In column #5 starting at the fourth tile from the top, paint 5 tiles down orange.
In column #6 paint the third tile down green, paint the next 4 tiles below that red and paint the next tile below those, blue.
In column #7 paint the third and fourth tile down green, paint the next 3 tiles below that red and paint the next 2 tiles below those, blue.
In column #8 paint the second, third and fourth tile down green, paint the next 2 tiles below that red and paint the next 3 tiles below those, blue.
In column #9 starting at the second tile from the top, paint 4 tiles down green, paint the next tile below that red and paint the next 4 tiles below those, blue.
In column #10 starting at the topmost tile paint 5 tiles down green, paint the next 5 tiles below those, blue.
NONE

color the topmost leftmost tile orange. Color rightmost second from bottom tile, orange, now color all tiles in between those two tiles, orange, except for the seventh tile diagonally down from top left tile, color it yellow.
on the seventh vertical row from left, color all remaining tiles orange, leaving the yellow tile in that row, yellow.

Connect the seventh tile from the top, on the left most row with the 13th tile, uppermost on that vertical row, with orange tiles. Coloring all remaining tiles there orange to make a diagonal line there, mostly orange.
NONE
Paint a yellow tile in the fourth tile from the top of the seventh column from the left.
Paint the six tiles touching the yellow tile orange.
Paint six orange spokes radiating out from the center, starting with each of the orange tiles surrounding the center, extending to the far edges of the grid.
NONE
At the end, the center point will be changed from orange to yellow. Starting in the first column from the left, color the top most tile orange.
In the first column from the right, color the second tile from the bottom orange. Connect these 2 with a straight line of orange tiles.
In the first row from the left, color the 4th tile from the bottom orange.
In the 6th column from the right, color the topmost tile orange. Then, connect these 2 tiles with a straight line of orange tiles.
In the 7th column from the left, color the topmost tile orange. Color this column all the way down to the bottom orange.
In the 7th column from the left, color the 4th tile from the top yellow. It should already be orange, we will change it to yellow.
NONE
Fill in the 7th column with the color orange.
Fill in every other spot starting with the first one in columns 6 and 8.
Create upward diagonal lines extending from each blue spot to the edges.
NONE
With orange, paint the 7th column.
With blue, starting at the top of the 6th column, paint every other cell.
To the left of the orange line, for each of the blue cells in step 2, paint a diagonal line that gets higher as you go left.
With blue, starting at the top of the 8th column, paint every other cell.
To the right of the orange line, for each of the blue cells in step 4, paint a diagonal line that gets higher as you go right to the end of the grid.
NONE
On seventh Vertical row from left, color the entire row Orange. (top to bottom)
Color blue, the 5th and 6th vertical rows, topmost tiles on the row, leave the next 4 tiles, horizontally below it white.
Repeat the blue color pattern, then white row of diagonal tiles a total of 5 times, making alternating blue diagonal lines left of the orange line.
Repeat the same blue diagonal lines but mirror them on the right of the orange line, creating alternating diagonals of blue, 5 blue lines.
NONE
On second row from left, second tile up from bottom, color that tile blue and then all tiles touching that color green.
On sixth row from left, second tile up from bottom, color that tile green, color all tiles touching that tile, red.
On tenth row from left, color that tile that is second from bottom, red. Color in all tiles touching that one, Blue. (making a circle, hex like).

On fifth row from right going leftward, vertically, color the second tile from the bottom Blue, all tiles touching it should be Green, This will result in 4 tiles that are circles but look like flowers.
NONE

Paint the hexagon that is second to last in the second column blue, the second to last hexagon in the sixth column green, the second to last in the tenth column red, and the second to last in the fourteenth column blue.

Paint all of the hexagons touching the blue hexagon green, all touching the green hexagon red, all of the hexagons touching the red hexagon blue, and all of the hexagons touching final blue hexagon green.
NONE
In the first column on the left, paint the last two hexagons from the bottom green
In the second column, paint the bottom hexagon green, the next one up blue, and the next one up green
In the third column, paint the bottom two hexagons green.
skip the fourth column and in the fifth column, paint he bottom two hexagons red
in the sixth column, paint the bottom hexagon red, the next one up green, and the next one up red.
in the seventh column, paint the bottom two hexagons red.
skip the eight column and in the ninth column, paint the bottom two hexagons blue
in the tenth column, paint the bottom hexagon blue, the next one up red, and the next one up blue
in the eleventh column, paint the bottom two hexagons blue
skip the twelfth column and in column thirteen, paint the bottom two hexagons green
in the next column, paint the bottom hexagon green, the next one up blue, and the next one up green
in the next column, paint the bottom two hexagons green.
NONE
In the third column from the left paint the top most tile purple.
Paint the next two tiles below green.
Skip a tile and paint the next tile orange.
Paint the next two tiles below green.
In the next column paint the first two tiles at the top green.
Skip two tiles down and paint the next two tiles green.
Skip a tile down and paint the next tile yellow.
Paint the next two tiles blue.
In the next column paint the second tile from the top green.
Skip three tiles below and paint the next tile green.
Skip two tiles below and paint the next two tiles blue.
In the next column paint the second tile from the bottom blue.
In the next column paint the top most tile purple.
Paint the next two tiles below green.
Skip a tile and paint the next tile yellow.
Paint the next two tiles below blue.
In the next column paint the two tiles at the top green.
Skip two tiles and paint the next two tiles below blue.
Skip a tile and paint the next tile purple.
Paint the next two tiles below green.
In the next column paint the second tile from the top green.
Skip three tiles down and paint the next tile blue.
Skip two tiles below and paint the next two tiles green.
In the next column paint the second tile from the bottom green.
In the next column paint the top most tile red.
Paint the next two tiles below blue.
Skip a tile and paint the next tile below red.
Paint the next two tiles below blue.
In the next column paint the first two tiles at the top blue.
Skip two tiles down and paint the next two tiles blue.
Skip a tile and paint the next tile orange.
Paint the next two tiles below green.
In the next column paint the second tile from the top blue.
Skip three tiles down and paint the next tile blue.
Skip two tiles down and paint the next two tiles green.
In the next column paint the second tile from the bottom green.
In the next column paint the top most tile orange.
Paint the next two tiles below green.
Skip a tile and paint the next tile below red.
Paint the next two tiles below blue.
In the next column paint the two tiles at the top green.
Skip two tiles down and paint the next two tiles blue.
Skip a tile down and paint the next tile red.
Paint the next two tiles below blue.
In the next column paint the second tile from the top green.
Skip three tiles down and paint the next tile blue.
Skip two tiles down and paint the next two tiles blue.
In the next column paint the second tile from the bottom blue.
NONE
Use purple to fill in the 1st spots on the 3rd and 7th columns, and the 8th spot on the 8th column.
Use red to fill in the 1st and 5th spots on the 11th column, the 5th spot on the 15th column, and the 8th spot on the 16th column.
Use yellow to fill in the 8th spot on the 4th column, and the 5th spot on the 7th column.
Use orange to fill in the 5th spot on the 3rd column, 8th spot on the 12th column, and the first spot on the 15th column.
Use green to fill in the 2nd and 3rd spots on the 3rd column, 1st and 2nd spots on the 4th column, and 2nd spot on the 5th column.
Create the same shape with green on all the purple and orange spots.
Create blue shapes on the red and yellow spots.
NONE
In the third column from the left, fill the top three hexes green.
Fill the two hexes to the right in green, then the one to the right of that forming a triangle pointing right.
Leaving a one column space to the right, draw another triangle of the same shape in green.
Draw two more triangles to the right, leaving a one column gap between each, the right-most one in green but the one to the left of that in blue.
Draw 4 triangles beneath the first, vertically aligned but with a 1 hex gap between the bottom of one triangle and top of the next. The first triangle on the left is green, the other three are blue.

Draw another 4 triangles, offset one column to the right so there is a one hex gap between the two-hex vertical line of the triangle above with the three-hex vertical line of the triangle below. Two outer-most triangles are blue, the middle two triangles are green.

Change the color of the top-most corner hex of each triangle. Going from left to right, top to bottom, fill 2 purple hexes, one red, two orange, one yellow, two red, one yellow, one purple, one orange, one red.
NONE

using the red colour colour the hexagons in column one rows one and two, column one row one and column three row one and two. using the green colour colour the hexagons in column four row one, column five rows one and two and column six row one. repeat this pattern across to the end of the board. in column one skip rows three and four, and seven and eight and repeat this pattern across the board.

using the purple colour colour the hexagons in column one rows three and four, column two rows two and four, column three rows three and four. using the blue colour colour the hexagons in column four rows two, three and four. repeat this purple and blue pattern across to the end of this board. beginning in column one rows seven and eight repeat the purple and blue pattern across to the end of the board.
NONE
Use red first to alternate purple in every two spots on the first column.
Move to the next column and make the pattern, red, purple, white, purple all the way down and the last spot white.
Repeat step one on the next column.
Move to the next column and use the pattern green, 3 blues, all the way and the last spot white.
on the next column alternate 2 green and 2 purple all the way down.
Move to the next column and use the pattern green, purple, white, purple all the way down and the last spot white.
On the next column alternate 2 red, 2 purple all the way down.
Move to the next column and use the pattern red, 3 blues, and make the last one white.
On the next column alternate 2 red, 2 purple.
Move to the next column and use pattern green, purple, white, purple and the last spot white.
On the next column alternate 2 green, 2 purple.
Move to the next column and use pattern green, 3 blues and the last one white.
On the next column alternate 2 red, 2 purple.
Move to the next column and use pattern red, purple, white, purple and the last spot white.
Move to the next column and repeat step 13.
On the next column fill 1 green 3 blues, 1 green, 3 blues, 1 green, white.
Move to the next column and alternate 2 green, 2 purple.
On the last column use pattern green, purple, white, purple and the last spot white.
NONE
Paint the top 2 tiles red and the next 2 tiles purple, then repeat that pattern all the way to the bottom of columns 1, 3, 7, 9, 13, and 15
In columns 2 and 14, paint the tiles in order from the top down: red, purple, white, purple, red, purple, white, purple, red, white.
Paint the top tile green, then 3 blues, 1 green, 3 blues, 1 green, and 1 white in columns 4, 12, and 16.
Paint the top 2 tiles green, then 2 purples, 2 greens, 2 purples, and 2 greens in columns  5, 11, and 17
In columns 6, 10 and 18, paint the tiles in order from the top down: green, purple, white, purple, green, purple, white, purple, green, white.
In column 8 paint the top tile red, then 3 blues, 1 red, 3 blues, 1 red, and 1 white
NONE
Use red to fill the first spots on the 9th-11th columns.
Fill the rest of the 10th column with blue.
make yellow diagonal lines from first spots the 5th and 15th columns to the blue line.
Make yellow diagonal lines up to the blue line from the last spots on the 4th and 16th columns.
Use orange to fill the 4th-6th spots on the 8th and 12th columns.
Create diagonal lines from the first and last spots in the first and last columns to the ends of the orange lines you just made.
Fill the 5th and 6th spots on the 5th and 15th columns with orange.
Create diagonal lines from there to the 3rd and 7th spots in the first and last columns.
Fill in the 5th spots on the last and 2nd columns.
Fill in the 5th and 6th spots on the first column.
NONE
Fill the 10th column from the left with blue, apart from the very top hex which should be red.
Fill the square to the top-left and top-right of the line with red also.
Fill 2 diagonal lines with 5 yellow hexes, starting from the third hex down on either side of the blue line, going in a top-left and top-right direction.
Mirror the yellow lines with another set 6-hexes long going in a down-left and down-right direction starting with the 3rd hex from the bottom on either side of the blue line.
Draw a line of 3 vertical orange hexes on either side of the blue line, leaving an empty column between the blue and the orange, and a space between the yellow lines.
Fill orange lines parallel to the yellow lines, stretching from the orange vertical lines to the edges of the grid, with an empty line between them.
Fill 2 vertical orange hexes in the 5th column from the left and the 4th column from the right with orange, leaving a space between them and the existing orange hexes.
Draw another set of 4 lines parallel to the yellow and orange ones, in orange, connecting the vertical 2 hexes to the edge of the grid, again with a blank space between previous diagonal lines.
On the far right column, fill the single hex in the middle with orange.
On the far left, fill the two hexes in the middle with orange and a third hex in the second column so that a single empty hex is between these hexes and the orange lines drawn previously.
NONE
Paint one red tile at the top of each of columns eight, nine, and ten, counting from the right.
Paint all the blank tiles directly below the center red tile blue.
Starting in the spaces touching directly to the right and left between the top two blue tiles, draw two yellow diagonal lines up to the top edge of the grid, one to each side of the blue column.

Starting in the spaces touching directly to the right and left between the third and fourth blue tiles from the bottom, draw two yellow diagonal lines down to the bottom edge of the grid, one to each side of the blue column.

Put three orange tiles in the center of the blank space in the eighth column from the left, then extend the orange line to the top and bottom left corners of the grid, leaving a blank line one tile thick between this new line and the yellow lines above and below it.

Put two orange tiles in the center of the blank space in the fifth column from the left, then extend this line diagonally to the left edge above and below, leaving one tile thickness blank above and below, as in the previous step.
Put one orange tile in the center of the three blank tiles in the second column from the left.
In the leftmost column, put two orange tiles, centered to the left of the one from the previous step.
Duplicate this pattern of orange lines from steps 5 through 8 as a mirror image to the right of the central blue column, extending as far as the grid will allow.
NONE
Paint a tiny, three-tile triangle green starting with the second tile down in column eight, the tile underneath it, and the third tile down in column nine.
Paint a purple triangle that starts with the point being tile five in column nine and the two widest parts being the fourth tile in column seven and the sixth tile in column seven.
Paint a blue triangle that starts with the point being tile eight in column ten and the two widest parts being the sixth tile in column six and the tenth tile in column six.
Paint an orange triangle that starts with the point being tile six in column twelve and the two widest parts being the fifth tile in column ten and the seventh tile in column ten.
Paint a tiny, three-tile triangle red starting with the fourth tile down in column twelve, the tile underneath it, and the fifth tile down in column thirteen.
NONE
Use green to fill in the 2nd and 3rd spot on the 8th column, and the 3rd spot on the 9th column.
Use red to fill in the 4th and 5th spots on the 12th column, and the 5th spot on the 13th column.
Use purple to fill in the 4th-6th spot on the 7th column, the 4th and 5th spots on the 8th column, and the 5th spot on the 9th column.
Use orange to fill in the 5th-7th spots on the 10th column, the 6th and 7th spots on the 11th column, and the 6th spot on the 12th column.
Use blue to fill in the last 5 spots on the 6th column, the last 4 spots on the 7th column, spots 7-9 on the 8th column, spots 8 and 9 on the 9th column, and the 8th spot on the 10th column.
NONE

On the bottom of the sixth row from the left start a triangle using first 5 vertical tiles, then centering a progressively reduced number, numbering one less per line, composing 5, 4, 3, then 2 then 1 blue tile centered on that line going rightwards.

on the seventh line from the left (vertical line), 4th through 6th line down, color purple, then compose a triangle using centered tiles, 2 count, then 1 rightwards from that original 3 purple tile, using all purple there.
Repeat this triangle shape and orientation (step 2)starting on tenth row (vertical) from left. 4th, 5th, and 6th tile from the bottom, in orange,
on 8th row from left, second and third tiles down, color them green. Also color in the third tile from top on the 9th row from left.
Finally color (from) the 12th from the left of the fourth and fifth from the top down, Red, and the fifth from the top of the 13th row from the left.
NONE
Locate the 5th tile from the top in the 9th column from the left. Leave this tile unfilled, as well as the 6 tiles surrounding it. However, fill in with BLUE all tiles bordering this 7-tile nucleus.
Fill in (GREEN) the topmost tile of the 9th column.

Using the tile you filled in the above step and the top tile of the blue border from step 1 as the top and bottom of the shape, respectively, fill in the 4 adjacent tiles (GREEN) to make a hexagonal ring intercepting the blue border.
Rotate and repeat the above step five more times in a radially symmetric manner. You should end up with 6 smaller hexagonal rings intercepting the main blue ring (a snowflake shape).
NONE
With blue, paint the cell at the 9th column from left and 3rd row from top.
With blue, paint the cell at the 9th column from left and 7th row from top.
With blue, paint a hollow hexagon with the top and bottom vertices as the cells you painted in steps 1 and 2.
With green, paint the 5 uncolored cells around the cell at the 9th column from left and 2nd row from the top.
Repeat step 4 around the cell located at the 6th column from left and 3rd row from the top.
Continue repeating the pattern in step 5 around the blue ring so that you have a total of 6 green rings.
NONE
Make a blue circle in the middle by filling in the 3rd spot on the 9th column, and go down diagonally 2 spots, then vertically down 2 spots, and diagonally back to the 7th spot on the 9th column.
Use green to fill in the 3rd, 4th, 6th, and 7th spots on columns 5 and 13.
Fill in the 2nd, 4th, 5th, and 7th spots on the 6th and 12th columns.
Fill in the 3rd and 7th spots on the 7th and 11th columns.
Fill in the 1st, 2nd, 7th, and 8th on the 8th and 10th columns.
Finally fill in the 1st and 9th spots on the 9th column.
NONE
Fill the hex in the center (9th column from the left, 6th hex down) with purple.
Fill the 6 hexes touching the first with purple.
Fill the hex above and below the left-most two purple hexes with black.
Fill the hex in-between and to the right of the two right-most purple hexes with black. The overall shape should be a triangle pointing right.

Fill three triangle shapes of three green hexes each, with the two hexes at the base of each triangle touching the black hexes, and the point of the triangle pointing away from the purple hexes in the same direction started with the black hexes.
Fill the two hexes on either side of the point of all three green triangles with black. The combined shape of the black and green hexes is a triangle pointing back at the purple hexes.
In the 5th column from the left, fill the 3rd, 4th, 8th, and 9th hex from the top with red.
Repeat the pattern for the other 4 black hexes sticking out from the triangles, coloring the two hexes touching each with red, growing out from the purple center.
NONE
In column #5 paint the third and fourth from the top red and then the second and third from the bottom red.
In column #6 paint the third and eight tiles down black.
In column #7 paint the third and fourth from the top green and then the second and third from the bottom green.

In column #8 paint the topmost and bottommost tiles red. Then paint the second, fourth, seventh and ninth tiles down black. Paint the third and eight tiles down green, and the middle tiles fifth and sixth tiles down purple.
In column #9 paint the second tile down and bottommost tile red, then paint the fifth, sixth and seventh tiles down purple.
In column # 10 paint the fifth and sixth tiles down purple.
In column # 11 paint the sixth tile down black.
In column # 12 paint the fifth and sixth tiles down green.
In column # 12 paint the fourth and eighth tiles down red, paint the fifth and seventh tiles down black and then the middle sixth tile down green.
In column # 13 paint the fourth and seventh tile down red.
NONE
Make a purple flower with six petals with the center in the ninth column, sixth tile down.
Color the third tile down in the sixth column black.
Color the second and fourth tiles black in the eighth column.
Color the three tiles between the black tiles green.
Color two tiles red on each outer side of the two outermost black tiles.

Copy the same red, black, and green pattern going out from the right of the purple flower and to the bottom left of the purple flower. The purple flower will have three antenna-like structures attached to it evenly spaced around the flower.
NONE
Fill in (BLACK) the 4th tile from the top in the 7th column from the left.
Fill in (BLACK) the 5th tile from the bottom in the 12th column from the left.
Connect a diagonal (BLACK) between the two tiles you filled in the previous steps.
Color (BLUE) all tiles adjacent to at least TWO black squares on the upper right edge of the diagonal you made above.

Repeat the above step four more times, thinking of the black diagonal as the base of a pyramid. From "bottom to top", the colors should be: GREEN, RED, YELLOW, PURPLE. There should only be one purple tile.
Reflect the multi-colored triangle you made in the previous two steps symmetrically over the black diagonal.

NONE
Paint a black diagonal line starting with the fourth hexagon in column seven and ending with the sixth hexagon in column twelve.
Paint diagonal blue lines on each side of the black line starting with the fifth hexagon in column seven and ending with hexagon seven in column eleven and then starting with hexagon three in column eight and ending with hexagon five in column twelve.
Paint green diagonal lines on each side of each blue lines being four hexagons long.
Paint red lines, three hexagons long on each side of the green lines.
Paint yellow lines, two hexagons long, on each side of the yellow lines.
Add a purple line, one hexagon long on each side of the yellow lines.
NONE
With black, paint the cell at the 7th column from left and 4th row from top.
With black, paint the cell at the 12th column from left and 6th row from top.
With black, connect the two black cells to form a line.
With blue, paint underneath each of the black cells except for the last black cell on the right.
With green, paint underneath each of the blue cells except for the last blue cell on the right.
With red, paint underneath each of the green cells except for the last green cell on the right.
With yellow, paint underneath each of the red cells except for the last red cell on the right.
With purple, paint underneath the left yellow cell.
With the black line being the line of symmetry, mirror the pattern in steps 4-8.
NONE
Use yellow and start at the top spot in the 9th column to make diagonal lines going down to the left and right from there to the 3rd and 15th columns.
Create diagonal lines going up from the 9th spot in the 9th column to the 3rd and 15th columns.
Fill in the space between each sets of lines.
Make concentric circles going in with purple, then yellow alternating, ending with 1 yellow dot in the center.
Change the color to purple in the 5th spot in the 5th and 13th columns, and to yellow in the 7th and 11th columns.
Use red to create diagonal lines going down from the 1st spot in the 1st column to the yellow circle, and from the next to last spot in the last column up to the yellow circle.

NONE
    In the 3rd column from the left, fill three hexes with yellow starting with the 4th hex from the top.
    In the 4th column from the right, fill three hexes with yellow starting with the 4th hex from the top.
    Connect the two yellow lines on top and bottom with symmetrical V and upside-down V lines forming a continuous shape.
    Line the inside of the yellow shape with a single line or purple hexes.
    Fill the left-most and right-most hex inside the shape with purple.
    Line the inside of the shape with a single line of yellow, then on the inside fill the left-most and right-most hex with yellow.
    Line the inside with purple to form a circle, fill the single hex in the center of the circle with yellow.
    Fill a red line starting with the hex in the top-left corner of the grid, heading in a down-right direction, all the way to the right edge of the grid but no covering any of the previously drawn pattern (you'll use 4 hexes in top left and 5 hexes in bottom-right)

NONE
Paint hexagons four, five, and six of columns three and fifteen yellow.
Paint the first hexagon in column nine yellow as well as all those between that hexagon and the fourth hexagon in column fifteen and the fourth hexagon in column three yellow to make two diagonal lines and then continue that pattern below with the second to last hexagon in column nine being the center point of the lower two diagonal lines. 
Paint all of the hexagons touching the inside of the yellow border purple as well as the fifth hexagon in columns five and thirteen.
Paint hexagons four and five in columns eight and ten purple as well as the fourth and sixth in column nine. 
Paint all of the hexagons between the purple circles of hexagons yellow as well as the fifth hexagon in column nine. 
Paint two diagonal rows of red hexagons starting with the first hexagon in the first column and ending with the second hexagon in the fourth column and then again starting with the second to last hexagon in the last column and ending with the seventh hexagon in the fourteenth row.
NONE
Starting at the top left corner, leave that left most top tile blank, color the three tiles in a horizontal just to the right and down, red.
Skip a horizontal row, leaving it blank, then repeat the horizontal red pattern, coloring the 7 tiles there red.
Repeat the horizontal stripe again, leaving a blank then red horizontal pattern, it will comprise itself of 11 tiles.
touching and to the right downwards create a blue horizontal line touching the top rightmost red tile so far colored in. color in 7 tiles, blue there.
Going leftward and down from there, leave a row of blank tiles(7 ct). then color the row below that yellow.
Skip a row of 7 blank, then color the next row blue.
continue to alternate in this manner until you have three blue rows, 3 yellow rows and 5 blank rows of 7 tiles (each row is comprised of 7 horizontal tiles) to separate them.

On the fifth row from the top on the right most column, color that tile red. On the eighth row from the left, bottom most tile, color that tile red. connect the two red tiles with a line of red diagonal lines there.
Leave a blank horizontal line to the right and below the red line created in step 8. Then color in the next horizontal line of 7 tiles, red.
Skip a horizontal line of white tiles, then color those last three horizontal tiles red.
NONE
Paint red diagonal lines of hexagons starting with hexagon two in column one and ending with the first hexagon in column three.
Paint another diagonal line of red hexagons starting with the fourth hexagon in column one and ending with the first hexagon in column seven.

Paint a red diagonal line of hexagons starting with hexagon six in column one and ending with the first hexagon in column eleven and then again starting with the last hexagon in column eight and ending with the fifth hexagon in the last column.

Paint a row of red hexagons starting with the last hexagon in column twelve and ending with the seventh hexagon in the last column and then again starting with the last hexagon in column sixteen and ending with the second to last hexagon in the last column.

Paint diagonal lines alternating between yellow and blue between the sets of red lines starting with a line of yellow hexagons starting with hexagon six in column two and ending with the second to last hexagon in column eight.

Paint a blue line of hexagons starting with the fifth hexagon in column four and ending with the eighth hexagon in column ten and then again starting with hexagon three in column eight and ending with hexagon six in column fourteen and one last time starting with the first hexagon in column twelve and ending with the fourth hexagon in the last column.

Paint a row of yellow hexagons starting with hexagon four in column six and ending with hexagon seven in column twelve and then again starting with the second hexagon in column ten and ending with hexagon five in column sixteen.
NONE
Draw a line of 3 red hexes, starting with the 2nd hex from the top in the left-most column, ending with the top hex in the 3rd column from the left.
Draw a parallel red line 7 hexes long underneath the first with a single line of white hexes inbetween.
Draw a parallel red line 11 hexes long underneath the second with a single line of white hexes inbetween

Draw 3 more parallel red lines in a mirrored configuration in the bottom-right corner of the grid (starting with 3 hex long line from the bottom of the 3rd column from the right to the 2nd hex from the bottom on the right-most column)
Color the 4th hex from the top in the right-most column blue, then fill a line in the top-left direction until it touches the red line.
Color a yellow line parallel to the blue line, below it with one white line in between.
Repeat the blue and yellow lines in parallel twice, again with one line of white inbetween, for a total of 3 blue and 3 yellow lines.
NONE
In column 10 from left, color hexagons 4-6 from top black, 1-2 from top green, and 2-3 from bottom black
juxtaposing three middle hexagons from step 1, color two green hexagons on either side

color a black, straight line descending, and another ascending from middle black hexagons from step one; the ascending one should stop at column 4 and descending straight black line should stop and column 4
next to last black hexagon of ascending black line, color two green hexagons, then one black, then two green; do the same design but opposite color scheme at the end of descending black line
1st column from right, 5th hexagon from top make black; heading left, immediately make two green hexagons, one yellow, two greens, then one black

adjacent to two green hexagons in column 9 from left, make one ascending straight (to left) green line ending at column 3 (from left); add one green hexagon directly above it then two green hexagons in corner of 1st column from left; between these two green diads is a black hexagon; repeat this at bottom of columns 1-3

make another green, straight descending line from second green hexagon in column 9 from left; this line should end at column 3 and it should have the same corner structure attached to it as described in step 6.
column 2, 5th from top, make green; moving right, color two black hexagons, one yellow, two black, and one more green
Finally, in column 8 from left, color hexagons 1-2 from top black, and 2-3 from bottom green.

NONE
    Starting in the top-left most hex, fill a line of 11 hexes connected in a down-right direction. Fill the hexes green except for the second and second-to-last hexes which should be black.
    Fill the second hex from the top in the left-most column green, also fill the top hex in the 3rd column from the left green.
    Starting in the bottom-right most hex, fill a line of 10 hexes connected in a top-left direction. Fill the hexes black except for the second from start and the very last hexes which should be green.
    In the right-most column fill the second hex from the bottom black, also fill the bottom-most hex in the 3rd column from the right black.
    Mirror the green line with 2 black hexes, starting in the bottom-left corner and drawing a line of 11 hexes, adding the two green hexes to form a bow-tie shape in the corner.
    In the fourth column from the right, starting with the 2nd he from the top, fill a black line of 6 connected hexes to meet the other filled hexes in the center of the grid.
    Add a green bow-tie shape with a black center in the upper-right corner, the black center of the bow-tie in the 2nd column from the right, 2nd hex from the top.
    In the 8th column from the left fill the top two hexes black, and the 2nd and 3rd from the bottom green.
    In the 10th column from the left fill the top two hexes green, and the 2nd and 3rd from the bottom black.
    Create a black bow-tie shape with a yellow center, the yellow center hex in the 4th column from the left, 5 hexes down.
    Fill a green hex on either side of the black bow-tie (the single hex touching both black hexes on either side)
    Copy they bow-tie with 2 extra hexes on the right side of the grid, the yellow hes in the 3rd column from the right, 5 hexes down, but make the hexes around yellow green and the extra hexe on either side black.
NONE
Counting from the top and right, in column nine, paint a vertical trio of black tiles in tiles four, five, and six.
Paint vertical pairs of green tiles touching on each side of the center tile of the black trio.
Using black, in the second column from the left, paint the top tile and second tile from the bottom, then paint a green vertical pair adjacent to either side of the black tile.

In the second column from the right, paint the bottom tile green and the second tile from the top black, then put green vertical pairs on each side of the black tile and black vertical pairs on each side of the green tile, to form clusters of five painted tiles.

Paint diagonal lines of black to connect the central trio to the clusters on the right, with the top line going from the upper right edge of the top trio tile to the left center of the upper cluster, then the lower line connecting the bottom right edge of the bottom trio tile to the upper left edge of the lower cluster.
On the left of the center cluster, draw green diagonal lines connecting the left vertical green pair to the left corner clusters.
Paint a yellow tile in the fifth tile down in column three from the right and column four from the left.

Form clusters centered on the yellow tiles, by putting green vertical pairs next to the right yellow tile and black vertical pairs next to the left yellow tile, then add one more tile in the opposite color centered at the right and left outer edges of each of those clusters.
In the center column, paint a green vertical pair starting in the top tile and a black vertical pair starting in the second tile from the bottom.
In a direct horizontal line to the left of the pairs from the previous step, paint a pair of the contrasting color in the next available column to the left.
NONE
Make a red flower by filling the 2nd and 3rd spots on the 3rd and 5th columns, and the 1st and 3rd spots in the 4th column, then fill the middle with yellow.
Fill the 4th-6th spots in the 4th column with green and start the top of a purple flower in the next spot.
Finish the purple flower, and make the center yellow.
Recreate this shape with two flowers in the 7-9th columns with an orange flower on top, yellow line, and blue flower on bottom, all yellow centers.
Make another in columns 11-13 starting with a blue flower on top, green line, and orange flower on bottom.
Make the last one on columns 15-17 with a purple flower on top, yellow line, and red flower at the bottom.

NONE
Paint the second and eighth hexagons in columns four, eight, twelve, and sixteen yellow.
Paint all of the hexagons surrounding the second hexagon in the fourth column red as well as all of the hexagons surrounding the eighth hexagon in column sixteen.
Moving left to right, continue painting all of the hexagons surrounding the yellow ones, starting with the one directly to the right of the red one just painted, paint around the next one orange, then blue, then purple surrounding the second hexagon in column sixteen.
Painting around the yellow hexagons in the eighth position of the columns, moving left to right paint around the first yellow hexagon purple, then blue, orange, and lastly red.
Paint lines connecting the shapes in the top row to the bottom by starting with the fourth, fifth, and sixth hexagons in column four being painted green as well as in column twelve.
Paint the fourth, fifth, and sixth hexagons in columns eight and sixteen yellow.
NONE
on fourth row from left, second tile down color that tile yellow. next color all tiles touching that yellow tile red.
Repeat the image on Third row from right, third tile from bottom, color that yellow, and surround with red, repeating step 1 design.
On fourth row from left, third tile from bottom, color that tile yellow and all tiles near it  purple.
Repeat this design (from step 3) on third row from rightmost row going left, second tile down, make this yellow and all tiles around it purple.
Color on 8th row from left, second tile down, yellow and all tiles touching it orange. Repeat this design exactly using as center yellow tile from rightmost side leftward seventh row, third tile up.
ON eighth row from left, third tile up color it yellow, color all tiles touching it blue. Repeat this design on 12th columnar row from left, second tile down, using that as the yellow center there.
Below the Red flower created in step 1 add three tiles from the lowest most red tile there to connect the purple flower below that.
From the bottom of the purple flower created during step 4, color the three tiles below the lowest purple tile in this configuration yellow.
From bottom of orange flower created in step 5 extend three yellow tiles under the lowest orange tile there, connecting to the blue flower below it.
Tiles connecting the flowers from left to right top to bottom will create a green three tile line, then yellow three tile line, then green again, then yellow again.
NONE
Fill in the 10th column with green.
Create a red diagonal line going up from the last spot in the 1st column to the 1st space in the last column, leaving the green line in tact.
Create a blue diagonal line going down from the 1st spot in the 1st column to the next to last spot in the last column, leaving the green line in tact.
Fill the triangles formed on the left and right side with yellow.
Fill both triangles at the top with orange.
Fill both triangles at the bottom with purple.
NONE
Paint the entire ninth column from the right green.
Using red, paint the diagonal line of tiles from lower left corner to upper right corner, skipping over the tile that is already painted.
With blue, paint the diagonal line of tiles from the upper left corner to the second tile from the bottom in the far right column, skipping over the tile that is already painted green in the center.

In the quadrants formed by the red and blue X, paint all remaining blank tiles in the right and left quadrants yellow, the upper quadrant orange, and the bottom quadrant purple, ignoring any tiles that are already painted.
NONE
Paint all tiles in column ten green.

Starting with the first tile in the first column, go diagonally downwards to the right and paint all the way down to the second to last tile in the last column blue (except for the single green tile in the middle).
Starting with the last tile in the first column, go diagonally upwards to the right and paint all the way up to the first tile in the last column red (except for the single green tile in the middle).
There should be a total of six triangles of varying sizes left white. Paint ONLY the triangles on both the left and right sides yellow. On the left will be 36 tiles, and on the right 28.
Paint the two triangles at the top orange. There will be 16 to paint on each side.
Paint the remaining two triangles at the bottom purple. There will be 20 on each side.
NONE

On the first row on the left side, color black the sixth tile down, do the same for the fifth tile down on the right most edge of the grid (color that tile black too).  Now color the bottom tile of the ninth row from the left, black.  Now connect all these tiles by coloring in all tiles in between them black also. This will form a very wide V of black.
Just above every tile colored in black, during step 1, color those tiles red, coloring each one touching the top of a black tile, red. This will result in a red v.
Color every tile above the red colored tiles, blue, resulting in a third v, shaped exactly as before, coloring each exposed tile atop of the red tiles with blue tiles.

In the lowest part of the blue V, at the center of the grid, color that low tile there, orange, also color the tile above that orange, then the two tiles just to the right of that line, orange, resulting in the 4 lowest tiles in the v, newly created, being orange.
Color every tile that is blank, that touches an orange tile, yellow, this will result in the 5 tiles atop the orange there, being turned yellow.
NONE
Fill a line of 9 blue hexes, starting with the 4th hex from the top in the left-most column, filling out toward the bottom-right.
Continue with a line of 9 blue hexes in a top-right direction to form a V shape which touches both side of the grid.
Fill another V shaped line directly below the blue one with red.
Fill another V shaped line directly below the red one with black.
Fill the four lowest hexes inside the blue V with orange, to form a UFO shape in orange.
Fill an upside-down V with yellow directly on-top of the orange UFO using 5 yellow hexes total.
NONE
Use black to fill in diagonal lines going down toward the center from the 6th spot on the first column and 5th spot on the last column.
Create the same style lines in red from the 5th spot on the first column and the 4th spot on the last column.
Create the same style lines in blue from the 4th spot on the first column and the 3rd spot on the last column.
Use orange to fill in the 6th spots of the 8-10th columns, and the 7th spot on the 9th column.
Use yellow to cover the orange shape in an arc from the 5th spot on the 9th column going down to the blue line.
NONE
Draw a continuous orange line from the topleft most tile all the way to the bottom right.
Draw an intersecting orange line down the 7th column.
Where the two lines intersect, colour the tile in yellow.
From the yellow tile, draw a diagonal orange line going to the bottom left.
From the yellow tile, draw a diagonal orange line going to the top right.
NONE
In the seventh column from the left, paint the fourth tile from the top yellow
Paint all of the tiles adjacent to this yellow tile orange.
Paint all of the remaining tiles in the column containing the yellow tile orange.
Paint the top left tile orange.
Paint the second tile from the bottom in the rightmost column orange.
Paint each unpainted tile in the diagonal line directly between these last two tiles orange.
Paint the fourth tile from the bottom of the leftmost column orange.
Paint the top tile of the sixth column from the right orange.
Paint each unpainted tile in the diagonal line directly between these last two tiles orange.
